articles.description: Cristiano Ronaldo put Al Nassr ahead in their Saudi Pro League clash against Damac with a wonderful free-kick.
articles.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo gave Al Nassr the lead in their Saudi Pro League clash against Damac on Saturday with a free-kick out of the very top draw. 
The 38-year-old forward, who has now scored 41 goals in… [+2683 chars]

articles.author: Abhishek Mukherjee
articles.title: ODI World Cup 2023: Shubman Gill and other Indian cricketers within inches of setting new world records - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Most sixes in World Cup history, most ODI 100s, fastest 2,000 runs, and possibly the most ODI runs in a calendar year are among the records that could be broken by the end of ODI World Cup 2023.
articles.content: Against Afghanistan at Delhi, Rohit Sharma smashed a belligerent 84-ball 131, the fastest World Cup 100 by an Indian. It also took him past Sachin Tendulkars World Cup record of six centuries. Sharma… [+5229 chars]
